xzaxgIpKwYQ#0#PL_oohi_O51Z_lORk8SCG_4x1s: list for monetary policy and financial regulation and supervision the Federal Reserve takes very seriously its role as a research institution I want to thank our research conference committee for putting together this high-caliber research conference which is gathered distinguished speakers and guests from around the world and I'm sure this conference will add to our understanding of the implementation and transmission of monetary policy so again welcome everyone to the Federal Reserve board and I hope you all have an enjoyable and productive discussion over the next two days
